statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{7 \, x^{3} + 6 \, x^{2} - 11 \, x - 17 , -x^{3} - x^{2} + 5 \, x + 5 , -4 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x + 2 , -x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + 29 \, x + 23 , -2 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - 14 \, x - 8\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
